entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
